column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Shiro Shinobi says : " Folks , after a year of waiting the Pro-bending Championship is finally here .
#Text=And their opponents , the Red Sands Rabaroos !
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " What an explosive opening volley .
#Text=Both teams quickly recover and unleash a barrage of bending .
#Text=I am astonished with the level of improvement displayed here by the Fire Ferrets .
#Text=No wonder the Avatar has been absent from the papers lately .
#Text=She 's obviously had her nose to the grindstone in the gym .
#Text=The Ferrets advance into Rabaroo territory and are holding nothing back .
#Text=Nice sprawl there by Mako .
#Text=Bolin strikes , Ula dodges , and all three Rabaroos are down .
#Text=The Fire Ferrets easily take round one !
#Text=" Ring announcer says : " Round two !
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " The Rabaroos are looking for payback and they go straight after Bolin .
#Text=Korra comes to his defense and water - whacks Umi back into zone two !
#Text=The Ferrets are on fire tonight and they win round two .
#Text=" Ring announcer says : " Round three !
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " With the Rabaroos down two rounds they 'll need a knockout to win , and with the way the Fire Ferrets are playing I do n't see that happening .
#Text=These Ferrets are working together like a well - oiled bending machine .
#Text=Bolin passes Adi back into zone two and the Ferrets get the green light to advance .
#Text=The Rabaroos are just fighting to stay at their feet at this point .
#Text=Out goes Adi , and Ula , and Umi !
#Text=" Ring announcer says : " All three rounds go to the Future Industries Fire Ferrets to win the opening match of the tournament !
#Text=" Bolin says : " That 's what I 'm talking about !
#Text=Thank you , thank you very much !
#Text=Thank you all you fans !
#Text=" Mako says : " Wow , we were really connecting out there in that ring .
#Text=" Korra says : " Yeah !
#Text=You know , I feel like the two of us have been connecting really well out of the ring , too .
#Text=" Mako says : " Uh , sure .
#Text=" Korra says : " So , I was thinking we should spend some time together .
#Text=" Mako says : " Oh , we 've been spending lots of time together .
#Text=" Korra says : " I mean outside of the gym , and not while searching for kidnapped family members or fighting chi blockers .
#Text=" Mako says : " I do n't know .
#Text=Asami and I have — " Korra says : " Look , I really like you and I think we are meant for each other !
#Text=" Mako says : " Korra , I 'm really sorry , but I just do n't feel the same way about you .
#Text=" Korra says : " Forget I ever said anything ... " Asami says : " Congratulations , guys !
#Text=You were so amazing out there .
#Text=" Bolin says : " So , Korra , I was thinking , you and me , we could get some dinner together , sort of a date situation .
#Text=" Korra says : " Oh , that 's really sweet , but I do n't think so .
#Text=I do n't feel very date - worthy .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Are you kidding me ?
#Text=You 're the smartest , funniest , toughest , buffest , talentedest , incrediblest girl in the world !
#Text=" Korra says : " You really feel that way about me ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " I felt that way since the moment I saw you !
#Text=Trust me , I know we 're gon na have so much fun together .
#Text=" Korra says : " You know what ?
#Text=I could use some fun .
#Text=Okay , sure !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yes !
#Text=Who 's the luckiest guy in the world ?
#Text=Right here , Bolin !
#Text=" Bolin says : " So , how do you like it ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Hmm , it 's delicious and totally authentic !
#Text=I did n't realize how much I missed Water Tribe grub .
#Text=" Bolin says : " That 's great , 'cause this is my favorite joint .
#Text=See ?
#Text=You love Water Tribe food , I love Water Tribe food , just another reason we are so great together .
#Text=" Korra says : " They are good noodles !
#Text=Hey , who 's that creepy guy over there who keeps glaring at us ?
#Text="
